title: Censere - Simulation Results
text:
Abstract
Censere is a numerical simulation framework for modelling the human settlement of Mars.
This report is autogenerated from a supplied simulation run.

title: The Supply and Consumption of Resources
text:
Abstract
This chapter summarises resource supply, storage and consumption.

Does it make sence to show/compare individual resources when there are multiple simulations - probably not
